actionConfiguration.body:
SELECT cdm.chapter_tag, cdm.publication_id, cdm.subject_id, cdm.chapter_name
FROM public.chapter_details_master cdm
 join public.school_class_info sci
on cdm.std = sci.std  where cdm.publication_id = (select publication_id from public.school_academy
 where class_id = '{{stdCopy.selectedOptionValue}}' and subject_id = '{{RadioGroup1Copy.selectedOptionValue}}' ) and cdm.subject_id = '{{RadioGroup1Copy.selectedOptionValue}}' 
 and sci.class_id = '{{stdCopy.selectedOptionValue}}'


 order by chapter_tag asc
